Title: Infrared = Infradead
Description:
Keep your voice down. The glen north and west of here is crawling with Alliance assassins.

Unfortunately, we haven't been able to spot them. The cowards! They hide and won't fight face-to-face.

You goblins are known for your wondrous goggles. Surely you have a pair that will allow you to see them?

I need you to team up with one of my scouts and kill any of the SI:7 assassins that you spot.
ObjectivesText:
Kill 10 SI:7 Assassins.

If something happens to your Orc Scout, return to Kilag to see if he has another for you to team up with.
RewardText:
Well done, $n, well done. We'll make an orc of you yet!

Time to move on. We'd better hurry.
